name: Rend The Dark: Back From The Dead
name_original: Rend The Dark: Back From The Dead
description:
You are Theodore Rajess, Renowned priest and Cleric. Apollyon had opened a portal to hell and the worlds fate rested in your hands. After a long journey, you reached the gates to hell and returned Apollyon to his domain. 200 years later, long after your death, Apollyon had returned and has opened a portal to hell yet again. though the spirits have favour on your soul, causing you to raise from your grave to finish your business and once again defeat Apollyon.

Controls:

  • Left/Right - Move
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Attack
  • A - Cast Heal
  • S - Cast Water
  • D - Cast Flame
  • C - Climb
  • Shift - Dash
  • Q - Save (Cost x1 Cross)
